name: Jumpy Dude
description:
Jumpy Dude is a game made for the Epic MegaJam 2021 in a week using the theme Running Out Of Space!

Your goal is to reach the end of each level before you run out of space.

Tile color matters. Standing on a similar color tile won't cause it to fall but if you are a different color it will... You have been warned!

Purple tiles won't fall no matter what color you are.

Green tile will bounce you into the air. 

People have also claimed that spikes will appear out of some tiles.

And in some stories there are floating enemies...
